figtree.treeviewer.decorators
Class ContinuousColorDecorator

java.lang.Object
  figtree.treeviewer.decorators.ContinuousColorDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Decorator
public class ContinuousColorDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Decorator

This decorator takes an attribute name and a set of attibutable Objects. It autodetects the type of attributes and then provides a colouring scheme for them based on a gradient between color1 & color2.

Version:
$Id: ContinuousColorDecorator.java 822 2007-10-26 13:50:26Z rambaut $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut
